DetailMain.sql: SELECT * FROM traveluserdb.`vw_/service/detail_main` WHERE ServiceID=? LIMIT 1

DetailServiceMethod.sql: SELECT method.serviceMethodID, method.serviceTypeID, method.methodName, method.description, IF ( services.serviceMethod = method.serviceMethodID, '1', '0' ) as checked FROM traveluserdb.tab_servicemethod method LEFT JOIN traveluserdb.tab_services services ON (services.ServiceID = ?) WHERE method.ServiceTypeID = ?

Facility.sql: SELECT * FROM (select 1 ) as temp left join traveluserdb.`vw_/service/detail_facility` ON(1=1) WHERE ServiceID =? LIMIT 1

Policy.sql: SELECT sepolicy.policyType, policy.policyID, policy.policyName, policy.serviceTypeID, policy.day1, policy.ratio1, policy.day2, policy.ratio2, policy.day3, policy.ratio3, policy.day4, policy.ratio4, policy.customRatio, policy.caution, policy.description, policy.type FROM traveluserdb.tab_servicepolicy sepolicy LEFT JOIN traveluserdb.tab_policy policy ON sepolicy.PolicyID = policy.PolicyID WHERE sepolicy.ServiceID = ? ORDER BY sepolicy.PolicyType

VehicleInfo.sql: SELECT vehicleInfoID, serviceID, brand, model, produceYear, seats, person, clazz, insurance, luggage FROM traveluserdb.tab_servicevehicleinfo WHERE serviceID = ? LIMIT 1

VehicleCharges.sql: select chargeID as chargeID, serviceID as serviceID, chargeType as chargeType, chargePrice as chargePrice from traveluserdb.tab_servicevehiclecharge where ServiceID=? order by chargeType

VehicleAddress.sql: SELECT addressID AS addressID, serviceID AS serviceID, addressType AS addressType, address AS address FROM traveluserdb.tab_servicevehicleaddress WHERE ServiceID = ?

VehicleSchedule.sql: SELECT serviceID,guideID,userID,scheduleDate, DATE_FORMAT(scheduleDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as scheduleFormatTime ,status FROM traveluserdb.tab_servicevehicleschedule WHERE STATUS in (0,2) AND ScheduleDate>=CURDATE() AND serviceID  = ?

Labels.sql: select label as label from traveluserdb.tab_servicelabel where ServiceID= ?

ActivityPrice.sql: SELECT activityID AS activityID, serviceID AS serviceID, adultPrice AS adultPrice, kidPrice AS kidPrice, duration AS duration FROM traveluserdb.tab_serviceactivityprice WHERE ServiceID = ?

HouseInfo.sql: SELECT * FROM traveluserdb.`vw_/service/detail_house` WHERE serviceID = ? LIMIT 1

TravelogueDetail.sql: SELECT label, DAY, content, picURL, IF (picURL IS NULL or picURL='', NULL, TRUE) AS PE FROM traveluserdb.tab_shortdescription des WHERE des.RelativeID = ? and des.RelativeType = 1

UserFacilities.sql: SELECT * FROM traveluserdb.`vw_/facility/list` WHERE userID = ? order by updateDate desc

CarBrand.sql: select VehicleID as vehicleID,Brand as brand,Classify as classify from traveluserdb.tab_vehicle order by VehicleID asc
